full_summary:
=====================================

# Gravel Supplies Tender Announcement

### Reference Number:
WS3634778387-Doc3635312966

### Solicitation Number:
WS3634778387

### Publication Date:
October 20, 2022

### Tender Closing Date:
November 23, 2022 at 14:00 HNE

### Amendment Date:
November 8, 2022

### Expected Contract Start Date:
December 5, 2022

### Expected Contract End Date:
December 4, 2023

### Procurement Details:

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Notes:

*   The Department of National Defence (DND) requires gravel and sand products for the supply, delivery, and offloading at the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield, Alberta.
*   The period of the requirement is one year from issuance, with Canada retaining the irrevocable option to extend by an additional two, one-year periods.
*   Security requirements are associated with the requirement of the standing offer.

### Contact Information:

*   Name: Diane Warnell
*   Email: diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Organization: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Location: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada

### Question and Offer Submissions:

*   Submissions should be made through Ariba Discovery or CanadaBuys.
*   Supporting documentation and the bid should be submitted by the tender closing date and time.
*   Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.  # Gravel Supplies Tender Announcement # [](https://www.can
